Text:
Well, nice idea... the only HD quality file of this episode so far... but why matroska? It's a nightmare format for anyone who streams their video to TV, and a difficult format to transcode successfully.
v=10
a=10
format=3
What's wrong with the matroska container ? Every HD rip use it nowadays and it's supported by most media player.

With my crappy internet connection 1.36 GB would take way too long to download.

I downloaded one 323MB version but could not watch it cause video quality for it was just awful.
I wish someone would make normal 350MB version from this file.
@1mher3: It's in progress. I should post it in a few hours.
awesome but what about s01e14 to s01e16 in 720p seems that they are only in dvd rip help guys where to get these episodes 14 15 16 in 720p

Thanks ever so much. I can not wait for E18. What a great show. FOX lost out big time by ending this great show!
@Scifi-Sumo Caprica was originally aired on Syfy, which is owned by NBC Universal. Not FOX.
And thanks for the 720p, first time I've seen a cancelled epi on here in HQ.
